name: Sweet Dreams (Kmkranen, matchas, inyged)
description:
In this platformer, you play as The Dreamer, a cute kitty who is tasked with protecting the world by collecting pieces of cake. The Guardian will guide you through your quest, but be careful. If you fall, this sweet dream will turn into a nightmare.

Control your character with A, D, and space while exploring a vibrant dream world and defending it from darkness!

This project was created for Cal Women in Gaming's 2022 Game Jam!

2D Artist: Elle

3D Artist: Christine Hwang

Programmer: Kayla Kranen

Writer: Tessa Schaap
